name: test_e2e_with_logs[PATH_DOT_010]
description:

| Item | Value |

| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_DOT_010` |
| **Name** | MySQL config access via traversal |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | dot_dot_slash |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
